subject: Re: FW: [Admin] Payment Proposal - 9 Kneen Street, Fitzroy North VIC 3068 - ACCEPTED
preview: Thanks Sophie,  Also, please look into the following;   The automated Xero Invoice is at $0 (all works were built into 'optional works' not sure if this is why) PDF acceptance for all Melbourne jobs s

full_threads.body:
Thanks Sophie, Also, please look into the following;
  • The automated Xero Invoice is at $0 (all works were built into 'optional works' not sure if this is why)
  • PDF acceptance for all Melbourne jobs should be sent to me dgerlach@novaricollective.com as well as the Stylist/Trade Manager Lucy.
Thank you, Danielle Gerlach BUSINESS MANAGER 0437 320 704 | dgerlach@novaricollective.com 03 9580 4102 | Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195 novaricollective.com.au

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath and Joel,


Happy Friday!


Melbourne had their first sign off through the platform, and we've had a look at the PDF that gets sent to the client (attached), and all the text in the boxes look all jumbled, some of the text is to the left and some to the centre and overall just doesn't present well. (Sydney PDF's aren't doing this)


Can you please have a look and let us know?


Thank you!

Sophie Bekkeli
 ASSISTANT TO SENIOR STYLIST

sbekkeli@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019
novaricollective.com.au
